author: dreiss
msg: Rollback a few recent Erlang changes to fix blame data
My combined patch for THRIFT-599 was committed, but it is preferable
commit the individual patches to preserve the more detailed log and
blame data.  I'll recommit r987018 as a sequence of patches and r988722

author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Move more complexity out of C++ and into Java-land.  (See r990952)
Remove some obsolete forward class declarations.
(ClientContext): Initialize the baton, but not the listener member object.
(~ClientContext): Don't bother deleting the member listener object.
(getContext): Don't set the progress baton here.
(ClientContext): Add a progress listener member and method.
